title: DDFP 357: 'Hard Knocks' talk, David Garrard
itunes:title: DDFP 357: 'Hard Knocks' talk, David Garrard
description:
Shek is joined by NFL Fantasy Live analyst Marcas Grant and NFL Network anchor Patrick Claybon to discuss the Adrian Peterson saga and the team from any era they would most want to be on "Hard Knocks". David Garrard also joins the show and the guys give their NBA Finals predictions. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
